title: League Kids are such pathetic crybabies
body: I was Teemo top and I was splitting and the entire enemy team came top, tried to flank me and failed so hard and all ended up dying then surrendering. I call them bad in all chat, because it took 5 of them to not kill me even though they had two hard counters wukong and alkali... I ended up getting a verbal abuse warning. LOL!!! They deserve it if they can't kill the squishiest champ with 5 people.
